answers.answer: Nope the only one ..37 weeks. Miserable
U took the thoughts out of my head. I'll be 38 weeks tomorrow and I'm ready to have my old body back . I'm miserable at this point

Lol me too.  I have a 9 yr, 2 yr, 1 yr and this one is due in June.  So I pretty much feel like I have been prego for 3 years.  Ya I am so over it!  I can't wait to sleep however I want.  Tie my shoes. Not having to pee every few minutes. Being able to play with my kids and not waddle.  Lol hang in there!
38 weeks on Thursday and feel the same way so ready for my baby girl to come
I'm with u girl! I'm 37 wks, 4 days and I'm ready to sleep comfortably, workout, have some wine, and not have every task be complicated by my big *** belly lol!!
I'm 36 weeks and I too am ready to pop this boy out and run tonthe gym to get this body back in shape lol plus I can't wait to meet my little man
I just want to wear underwear without feeling like I'm cutting circulation!!!
An so over it but so scared for the ending i wanna sleep on my belly again n wanna see my lil Angel hope she makes it with all my heart am praying
Im 36 weeks. Over it. Over being huge, uncomfortable... back pains leg pains itching wearing my husband's clothes everyday... it's a task to do anything at this point... ugh!

I'm 38 weeks too. So over it! I'm actually to the point where I'm praying to go into labor. I've been dealing with Braxton hicks and every time I have any sort of feeling, I'm like "is it time?" And I get upset that I'm not going into labor. I've been super hormonal lately. And it's really annoying. I only have 14 more days to go. But it seems so far from now. Hopefully I won't have to wait much longer.

36+4 and absolutely miserable.  I want to wear my own clothes, and put on socks and shoes without help. I want to go to the bathroom only a cpl tines a say, and be able to get out of bed normally and sleep on my stomach. I want to actually sleep and not try to toss and turn and get comfy. Been having contractions since 33 wks. Dr put me in bed rest and said to make it to 36wks, I did and now baby doesn't want to show his face lol
I'm almost 35 weeks and feel the same way. It seems às if these last week's are dragging by!
I'm 40+5... I am definitely over it!!!!!
Im 37+1 and im so ready to meet my little boy.... hang on in there ladies our babies will soon arrive :)

I'm 37 weeks tomorrow with preeclampsia and just want my Lil boy here safe, I've had enough of hospitals and feeling like I've been hit by a bus with the energy of a over weight hippo 20 days seems too long lol I was crying in pain for most of the night with every movement the Lil man made it felt like I was being Stabbed in the sensitive area but I know he will be worth it in the end... good luck to you all we can do this,  one day at a time xx

question: Anyone else just absolutely tired of being pregnant? I'll be 38 weeks in one day, and I am so fed up with being pregnant at this point that it brings me to tears. I'm not depressed, but I am totally ready to meet my daughter and be able to get my damn shoes on without suffocating on my stomach. I keep trying to remind myself that she'll come when she's ready and if she's not ready yet then that's okay... But between the need for hot showers, naps, and the bathroom, mixed with sore back, hips, and thighs, I've about had it... Hoping I'm not the only one...
title: 37weeks6days & so over this!
